languages.text: [Обратиться к бойцам] "Эта тварь пророчит нам верную смерть. Но даже в смерти есть выбор — сдохнуть как мясо или умереть за Империум. Не позволяйте ксеносам вершить вашу судьбу, уйдите с именем Императора на устах!"

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к бойцам] "Эта тварь пророчит нам верную смерть. Но даже в смерти есть выбор — сдохнуть как мясо или умереть за Империум. Не позволяйте ксеносам вершить вашу судьбу, уйдите с именем Императора на устах!"

languages.text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к бойцам] "Эта тварь пророчит нам верную смерть. Но даже в смерти есть выбор — сдохнуть как мясо или умереть за Империум. Не позволяйте ксеносам вершить вашу судьбу, уйдите с именем Императора на устах!"

traits.locale_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

[Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

[Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

[Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

[Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

[Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

languages.text: [S'adresser aux combattants] « Cette abomination nous dit que notre mort est inéluctable. Mais nous avons encore un choix à faire : nous pouvons nous laisser faire comme le bétail ou succomber en nous battant au nom de l'Imperium. Ne laissons pas les xénos décider de notre sort ! Rendez votre dernier souffle, le nom de l'Empereur sur les lèvres ! »
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

traits.locale_text: [S'adresser aux combattants] « Cette abomination nous dit que notre mort est inéluctable. Mais nous avons encore un choix à faire : nous pouvons nous laisser faire comme le bétail ou succomber en nous battant au nom de l'Imperium. Ne laissons pas les xénos décider de notre sort ! Rendez votre dernier souffle, le nom de l'Empereur sur les lèvres ! »

languages.text: [对战士们开口]“这只怪物说我们必死无疑。但哪怕我们真的会死在这里，我们也可以自己做出选择。你们打算像畜生一样被人屠宰，还是要为了帝国而战？别让那些异形决定你们的命运！愿你们死前颂唱着帝皇的圣名！”
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

traits.locale_text: [对战士们开口]“这只怪物说我们必死无疑。但哪怕我们真的会死在这里，我们也可以自己做出选择。你们打算像畜生一样被人屠宰，还是要为了帝国而战？别让那些异形决定你们的命运！愿你们死前颂唱着帝皇的圣名！”

languages.text: ［闘士たちに向かって］「この忌まわしき者は、我々の死は確実だと言う。だが死に際しても選択はできる。家畜のように屠殺されるか、帝国のために死ぬかだ。異種族に運命を握らせてはならない！願わくば皇帝陛下の名を叫びながらこの世を去れ！」
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

traits.locale_text: ［闘士たちに向かって］「この忌まわしき者は、我々の死は確実だと言う。だが死に際しても選択はできる。家畜のように屠殺されるか、帝国のために死ぬかだ。異種族に運命を握らせてはならない！願わくば皇帝陛下の名を叫びながらこの世を去れ！」

languages.text: [An die Kämpfer wenden] "Dieses Scheusal meint, unser Tod sei sicher. Aber selbst im Tod hat man die Wahl – sich wie Vieh abschlachten lassen oder fürs Imperium sterben. Lasst nicht zu, dass die Xenos über Euer Schicksal entscheiden! Möget Ihr den Namen des Imperators auf Euren Lippen haben, wenn Ihr aus dem Leben geht!"
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

traits.locale_text: [An die Kämpfer wenden] "Dieses Scheusal meint, unser Tod sei sicher. Aber selbst im Tod hat man die Wahl – sich wie Vieh abschlachten lassen oder fürs Imperium sterben. Lasst nicht zu, dass die Xenos über Euer Schicksal entscheiden! Möget Ihr den Namen des Imperators auf Euren Lippen haben, wenn Ihr aus dem Leben geht!"

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los luchadores] «Esta abominación dice que vamos a morir. Pero en la muerte también tenemos una elección: ser masacrados como ganado, o morir por el Imperium. ¡No permitáis que los xenos decidan vuestro destino! ¡Dejad esta vida con el nombre del Emperador en los labios!».
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los luchadores] «Esta abominación dice que vamos a morir. Pero en la muerte también tenemos una elección: ser masacrados como ganado, o morir por el Imperium. ¡No permitáis que los xenos decidan vuestro destino! ¡Dejad esta vida con el nombre del Emperador en los labios!».

languages.text: [Savaşçılara hitap et] "Bu garabet, ölümümüzün kaçınılmaz olduğunu söylüyor. Ancak nasıl öleceğimizi bile biz belirleriz: Kurbanlık koyun gibi katledilebilir ya da İmparatorluk uğruna can verebiliriz. Bu zenoların, kaderinizi tayin etmesine izin vermeyin! Bu dünyadan İmparator'un adını zikrederek göçün!"
languages.original_text: [Address the fighters] "This abomination says that our death is certain. But even in death, there is a choice: to be butchered like cattle or to die for the Imperium. Do not let the xenos decide your fate! May you leave this life with the Emperor's name on your lips!"

traits.locale_text: [Savaşçılara hitap et] "Bu garabet, ölümümüzün kaçınılmaz olduğunu söylüyor. Ancak nasıl öleceğimizi bile biz belirleriz: Kurbanlık koyun gibi katledilebilir ya da İmparatorluk uğruna can verebiliriz. Bu zenoların, kaderinizi tayin etmesine izin vermeyin! Bu dünyadan İmparator'un adını zikrederek göçün!"
